ygData.subject: Re: Hi I'm new
ygData.msgSnippet: Thank you for the input. I will try all that out. I think I am going to build a new char. I did something dumb. I went to high pass hold. I am now lvl 17--soon
ygData.messageBody:
Thank you for the input. I will try all that out.

I think I am going to build a new char. I did something dumb. I went
to high pass hold. I am now lvl 17--soon to be 16--just trying to
recover my corpse. I figure once I get to low of lvl to even get
inside high pass to get to my corpse, good time to build a new char.
with better abilities. Sad to see all that work go to nothing though.
This hef rgr seems to be a little retarded and handicapped. Too many
blunt hits to the head I guess... lol :?))

Maybe a gnome so I can learn tinkering. That sounds like fun.

--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, Martin Ashcraft <mrmarvinmars@y...>
wrote:
> hey there if you weant to lv up go to calbas and got to the tower
and fight untill you are up to 22 then go to missmore or you can go
to pc now and get in a group and do some lving there or you can go to
less faydark or ocen of tears or dagnors cauldron or unrest or erud's
crossing or swamp of no hope ok these are some area to go get lv up
ok hope i been some help ashma
>
> greg <gregdixon@s...> wrote:
>
> Hello All,
>
> I have been playing for about 2 1/2 yrs on Bristlebane. I managed
to
> force my hef rgr to lvl 18/19--18 is where I spend most of my time,
> but sometimes I lvl to 19.
>
> I have been recently been building my fletching skills(104). I
spent
> about 4hrs a day hunting in front of Qeynos killing green mobs for
> about 3wks. All I make is about 150plat in the 4 hrs with no exp,
but
> when I go hunting elswere--like bb--I only get about 5 plat for 4
hrs
> and some exp. I seem to go up about 2 skill points in that time in
> front of Qeynos.
>
> I don't mean to complain, but I am starting to feel sorry for all
> knolls and gopher snakes I've killed. Plus I would like to be able
to
> do more quests.
>
> I do want to earn everything myself, but would like to know where I
> can earn some serious plat? I have heard of people lvl 12 earning 4-
> 5000 plat/hr.
>
> How do they do that?
>
> Anyone have any suggestions?
>
> Thanks
>
